title: Rush: Stranded With a Stranger
description: He’s a stranger.An unexpected surprise.A risk I have no choice but to take, thanks to this blizzard.I shouldn’t want him.But his touch and his kisses…They’re the perfect distraction.Until this passes, anyway.My instincts said I’d be fine, but I should have listened to my head. Things that are so easy… so comfortable… so perfect…Are usually too good to be true.No matter how potent the rush.
author: Molly McLain
